testcase.purpose: Check if DirectoryEntry.createReader exists

Check if DirectoryEntry.getFile exists
Check if DirectoryEntry.removeRecursively exists
Check if DirectoryReader.readEntries exists

Check if can copy a file to a different location on the file system

Check if the type of Entry.filesystem attribute is object

Check if the type of Entry.fullPath is DOMString

Check if Entry.getParent exists

Check if the type of FileSystem.name is string

Check if getDirectory() has all valid arguments that expecting successCallback() is to be invoke
Check if create or look up a directory by DirectoryEntry interface
Check if create and exclusive are both true and the path already exists, getDirectory fail
Check If create is not true and the path exists, but is a file, getDirectory fail
Check if create is not true and the path doesn't exist, getDirectory fail
Check if create is true, the path doesn't exist, and no other error occurs, getDirectory create and return a corresponding DirectoryEntry
Check if getDirectory () without arguments that exception is thrown
Check if create or look up a file by DirectoryEntry interface
Check if create and exclusive are both true and the path already exists, getFile fail
Check if create is not true and the path exists, but is a directory, getFile failed
Check if create is not true and the path doesn't exist, getFile fail
Check if create is true, but the path is illegal character, getFile failed
Check if create is true, the path doesn't exist, and no other error occurs, getFile create it as a zero-length file and return a corresponding FileEntry
Check if getFile () without arguments that exception is thrown
Check if the parameter path is set empty string that expecting errorCallback() is to be invoked in getFile() method
Check if the parameter path is set null that expecting errorCallback() is to be invoked in getFile() method

Check if success delete a directory
